name: Sniper
description: A specialized marksman focused on precision ranged combat, elevation advantage, and long-distance elimination.

options.name: Elevation Advantage
options.description: When making ranged attacks from at least 2 units of higher elevation than your target, gain a bonus dice. When 10 or more units higher, you gain an additional bonus dice and your attack does not suffer a penalty dice if it is one range greater than your maximum optimal range.

options.name: Spotter
options.description: You are skilled in picking out targets that are trying to hide. Gain +1 skill with senses. You do not have to be alert to make a senses check when another creature makes a stealth check to become hidden.

options.name: Prone Shooter
options.description: You excel at shooting from concealed, low positions. Gain +1 skill with stealth. When making ranged attacks while prone, gain a bonus dice.

options.name: Complex Weapon Mastery
options.description: Gain +1 skill with complex ranged weapons

options.name: Action : Reactive Shot
options.description: You choose a target within your optimal range and take careful aim. If that target moves before the start of your next turn, you can immediately make a ranged attack against them at any point during their movement. If you use another reaction or are not able to use reactions, this attack fails.

options.name: Action : Snipe
options.description: You make an attack with a complex range weapon that allows you to shoot a creature that is two tiers Outside your maximum range without a penalty. If you are hidden, this attack is not affected by resistance and can only be completely mitigated.

options.name: Deadly Aim
options.description: Your maximum range with complex ranged weapons, simple ranged weapons, and throwing weapons is extended by one range category.

options.name: Action : Lock-In
options.description: You take careful aim and steady your breathing. Gain +1 energy and add a concentration check dice to your next ranged attack's dice pool.

options.name: Reaction : Calibrated Shot
options.description: After missing a ranged attack or dealing no damage with a complex ranged weapon due to mitigation, you can immediately make a second ranged attack with the same weapon against the same target but add a single logic dice into the calculation.

options.name: Master Sniper
options.description: When you shoot a creature from at least a distant (61+ Units) range, you have the potential to execute it depending on the amount of successful dice on the attack. 2 dice will execute a minion, 3 dice a thrall, 4 a standard creature and 5 a champion.
